articles.author: F1
articles.title: What the teams said - Sprint day in the United States - Formula 1
articles.description: The drivers and teams report back on all the action from the Sprint Shootout and the Sprint itself for the Formula 1 Lenovo United States Grand Prix 2023 at the Circuit of The Americas.
articles.content:
Red Bull
Verstappen more than made up for his mistake in qualifying yesterday by grabbing P1 in the Shootout, and following that up with Sprint victory. Bar a slightly hairy first corner when he had… [+26526 chars]
